TopicTitle: KSP won't close when i press the "quit" button.

Articles.Content:
When i press "Quit" all it does is freeze up the game, so now i have to use task manager in order to close it.

The mods i have are: Mechjeb, KAS, BDArmory, and the Physics Range Extender.

Please help.

Edited June 15, 2020 by sushi64
Grammar
Just so you know, I also have this problem. Are you using a Mac?

have a similar problem, (Using windows 10, 8gb of ram, A10 desktop APU and Radeon HD7770; yes I need to upgrade but whatever).

furthermore it gets even weirder for me; the process will be closed in task-manager but there will be a process that will be running the background that might prevent me from deleting or editing the mod files...

We need a catchy phrase like "no pics, no clicks" but about log files.

No logs, no.... 

...I got nothing.
